spellcasting.ability: charisma. it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:at will: detect magic, fog cloud, light3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

traits.Keen Smell: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Multiattack: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.
actions.Greatclub: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
